scripts.precopy: npm run clean -s && mkdir dist/img && mkdir dist/font && mkdir dist/pictures
scripts.copy: npm run copy:images -s && npm run copy:fonts -s && npm run copy:misc -s && npm run copy:pictures -s
scripts.copy:misc: cp app/index.php dist/ && cp app/.htaccess dist/ && cp app/favicon.ico dist/ && cp app/robots.txt dist/ && cp app/manifest.* dist/
scripts.build: npm run build:scripts -s && npm run build:styles -s && npm run build:markup -s
scripts.build:styles: cleancss --skip-rebase app/css/*.css -o dist/css/main.css && hashmark -s -l 12 -m assets.json --cwd dist css/main.css 'dist/css/{name}{hash}{ext}'
scripts.postbuild: replaceinfiles -r assets.json -s 'dist/index.html' -d '{dir}/{base}' && rimraf assets.json && rimraf dist/js/wallblog.js && rimraf dist/css/main.css
scripts.predev: npm run copy -s && npm run build -s
